Function: Controls opacity of all FX
Changes speed of playback (unless Video Sync is toggled)
Changes duration of synced playback when Video Sync is toggled.
Changes video playback to sync with tempo of your session rather than the Video Playback Speed slider.
When nothing is drawn, the background will alternate (with your session tempo) between BG Color #1 and BG Color #2
Changes the note value duration by which the background switches.
Tempo Division becomes a triplet of whatever note duration is selected.
Changes colors to their inverse.
Sends ripples through the image/video.
The rate of the ripples will correspond to the tempo of the session.
The amplitude of the horizontal ripples!
The amplitude of the vertical ripples!
The frequency by which the image ripples!
Puts a filter with a custom color on the image.
Red filter component.
Green filter component.
Blue filter component.
The opacity of the filter.
Shockingly, it makes the image look like a kaleidoscope.
The angle of the kaleidoscope (I don't really know)
Another fun thing to make the kaleidoscope move.
Yet, another fun thing to play with.
The amount of divisions in a half of the kaleidoscope.
The red component of BG Color #1
The green component of BG Color #1
The blue component of BG Color #1
